message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value to you, I propose an initial price of $15000. This reflects not only the product's worth but also the opportunity it presents for both of us.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. This is my top price for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product and your offer, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $13500. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $12750. This is my best and final offer on this price point.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $13000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise while still reflecting the product's value to you.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit far from the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you at $12250. This is my best offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on our previous discussions, I am willing to consider $12500 as the final price for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise considering the value you place on the product.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12200. This is my final offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've given this some thought and am willing to agree on a final price of $12300 for the product. I believe this price respects both the value of the product and your budget.
I appreciate your continued efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $12250. This is my final offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
